snippet: Deutsche Bank's request for shareholders to sign an 8 billion euro ($8.5 billion) check to back its new strategy got a lukewarm reception on Monday from investors who want more detail on its plans....

headline.main: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank's request for shareholders to sign an 8 billion euro ($8.5 billion) check to back its new strategy got a lukewarm reception on Monday from investors who want more detail on its plans.
